mean_cn: adj. 非常规的，不按照习惯【惯例】的，不落陈套的
mean_en: not following what is done or considered normal or acceptable by most people; different and interesting
sentence: Unconventional thinking has led to a lot of great inventions.
sentence_trans: 打破常规的思维已经带来了许多伟大的发明。
word_etyma: un 非 + con共同+vent来+ion表名词 + al ...的 → un 不+convention惯例，传统+ al ...的  → 非传统的
